resources.name: all-bookings
resources.description: Retrieve a general overview of all bookings, regardless of their status.

resources.name: active-bookings
resources.description: Retrieve all currently active bookings, including running and accepted ones.

resources.name: recently-cancelled-bookings
resources.description: Retrieve a list of recently cancelled bookings, limited to the last 50 cancellations.

resources.name: completed-bookings
resources.description: Retrieve a detailed list of completed bookings.

resources.name: edited-bookings
resources.description: Retrieve a list of all bookings that have been edited by users.

resources.name: all-resources
resources.description: Retrieve a list of all available resources from deskbird.
